ee anuwa, eki mila di gatha haki megawot 60ka pramanaya, ek aayojakayekuta uparima washayen megawot 01ka dharithawakin yuthu widuli balagarayak idi kirimata haki wana paridi, idiripath wi athi ayojakayan athare winiwidabhawayakin yuthuwa sadharana padanamak matha beda harimin 'surya bala sangramaya - adiyara 2' washayen nawa wyapruthiyak kriyathmaka kirima pinisa widulibala ha punarjananiya balashakthi amathya ranjith siyambaalapitiya mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.
ese nam janadhipathithumata anuwa singappuru giwisuma ratata hithakara giwisumak wiya yuthuya.
ema thiru lipi ekathuwa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage pradhanathwayen pasugiyada (12da) kolambaa padanam aayathanayedi pawathi uthsawayakadi granthayak lesin janagatha kerini.
